title: A Definitive Guide to the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) Filter
description: Remote Procedure Call (RPC) is one of the most widespread protocols in use today. It allows for inter-process communication, both on a single host and across the network, and serves as a critical building block for countless applications and services. For the sake of this guide, we?ll be referring to MSRPC as we discuss RPC, given the focus of our work.
author: Ophir Harpaz & Stiv Kupchik
